items.title: CATL Begins Taking Orders for World’s Top Listing in 2025
items.description: (Bloomberg) -- Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd. has started taking investor orders for a Hong Kong stock offering that is likely to be the world’s biggest listing this year. items.title: Gold takes a dive as US-China trade deal dents safe-haven appeal
items.description: Meanwhile, oil jumped by almost 3% as Washington and Beijing agreed to slash tariffs on each other.
